item.title: My emo picture i drew in ms-paint. i am proud of it
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Red Phat, post:31, topic:185061”][quote author=[-J O H N-] link=topic=246780.msg2079041#msg2079041 date=1204278329]
Mm, I see you don’t understand the actual meaning of EMO.

Emo is short for emotional. Emo’s are regular people that express themselves in a different way. Iether by not talking about there problems and bobbling the pain up. Or by telling everyone but not feeling good about it at all.

Some ‘emo’s’ are mistaken for cutters or gothics. Cutters are people who cut themselves to bottle up the pain. Gothics I have no idea about but there different.
[/quote]
The definition of emo is… ah, right here.

Emo: fucking twat that screams like hell.
Simple as that :)[/quote]

Moron.

[-j o h n-] was right.

Read full topic

item.title: My emo picture i drew in ms-paint. i am proud of it
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Cryme Time, post:10, topic:185061”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=246780.msg2079044#msg2079044 date=1204278629]
In other words, they are wussies who THINK they have problems but have no idea what a problem is.

See what happens when they make it so that beating children is illegal? Corporal punishment > *
[/quote]
Isn’t being a druggy the same thing? they use it to make their problems go away… drugs are just a way of escaping pain, so is emo in a way.[/quote]

Only a small percent of people use drugs for that reason.

I use them because they feel awesome, and are a lot of fun to explore. This however does not mean that I do not know how to have fun without drugs, which would be the next argument of some anti-drug person against me.

Read full topic
